attributes.action: Create a priority group for Key Workers in the COVID-19 Vaccination Programme
attributes.additional_details:
There are deep concerns about the health and safety of key workers who feel that they have been forgotten in the vaccine roll-out. 
Whilst we understand that the Government is following scientific advise on priority groups, we have experienced first-hand how devastating and crippling COVID-19 has been on delivering services that have helped keep the country going in these unprecedented times. 
At a time when work is very stressful, we need positive action rather than well meaning platitudes.
attributes.background: After the remaining priority groups have been vaccinated, make sure that all key workers are vaccinated before distributing to the rest of the adult population.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
